ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE JEAN-PIERRE PLOUFFE of Gatineau, Quebec, as Commissioner of the Communications Security Establishment, to hold office during good behaviour, for a term of three years, effective October 18, 2013.
